channel.title: ★-- Rune- union 718 Unique Features --★
channel.description:
-Player Owned Shops -Dungeoneering (Co-Op) -Construction-Build your own house -Trivia Rewards with shops -Trivia -Player-Driven Economy -Online 24/7 -DDoS Protected -All Skills Working -Friendly Staff Team -Dedicated -One of a Kind -120 Max Levels (169 max combat) -Customizable Client + All original matrix features -Automated double xp weekends -Donor Bonus XP -No Lag, No Downtime - Super fast 4GB Dedicated Server - Custom Zombies Minigame - Now features Clue Scrolls - Over 20 Titles to Unlock with various requirements - Cosmetic Overrides - Skilling Rewards - PVM Based with GREAT Eco - Choose your own exp rate, 5 to choose from! - Custom rewarding Achievements system - 5 man co-op Dungeoneering (all 60 floors) - Full Ring of Kinship - Construction - Grand Exchange - Farming - All Skills Working - Multiple agility courses - Less crashing, more play time - Super Stable - Great Economy - Decent Exp Rates -Castle Wars, Clan Wars pking, Edgville Pking -On-Spot Duel Everywhere -Minigames -25/25 Skills Trainable -Vorago, Leeuni Bosses -100th Prestige System -Boss Contractor -RealRs Dungeoneering with multiple floors -Player Owned Shops -Player Owned Houses -Multiple xp modes -Amazing donator benifits -Much much more Unique donation system much much more there too many content to upload pics but this is jus some of the features
Website: [url=http://www.rune-union.com]Rune-Union - The Players Escape.[/url]
Forums: [url=http://www.rune-union.com/forums/]Invision Power Board[/url]
Client : [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/yjqdhrrudt7615e/Rune-Union.jar?dl=0]Rune-Union Client[/url]

item.title: ★-- Rune- union 718 Unique Features --★
item.dc:creator: @mrstakes mrstakes
item.description:
@mrstakes wrote:

-Player Owned Shops
-Dungeoneering (Co-Op)
-Construction-Build your own house
-Trivia Rewards with shops
-Trivia
-Player-Driven Economy
-Online 24/7
-DDoS Protected
-All Skills Working
-Friendly Staff Team
-Dedicated
-One of a Kind
-120 Max Levels (169 max combat)
-Customizable Client

  • All original matrix features
    -Automated double xp weekends
    -Donor Bonus XP
    -No Lag, No Downtime
  • Super fast 4GB Dedicated Server
  • Custom Zombies Minigame
  • Now features Clue Scrolls
  • Over 20 Titles to Unlock with various requirements
  • Cosmetic Overrides
  • Skilling Rewards
  • PVM Based with GREAT Eco
  • Choose your own exp rate, 5 to choose from!
  • Custom rewarding Achievements system
  • 5 man co-op Dungeoneering (all 60 floors)
  • Full Ring of Kinship
  • Construction
  • Grand Exchange
  • Farming
  • All Skills Working
  • Multiple agility courses
  • Less crashing, more play time
  • Super Stable
  • Great Economy
  • Decent Exp Rates
    -Castle Wars, Clan Wars pking, Edgville Pking
    -On-Spot Duel Everywhere
    -Minigames
    -25/25 Skills Trainable
    -Vorago, Leeuni Bosses
    -100th Prestige System
    -Boss Contractor
    -RealRs Dungeoneering with multiple floors
    -Player Owned Shops
    -Player Owned Houses
    -Multiple xp modes
    -Amazing donator benifits
    -Much much more
    Unique donation system
    much much more there too many content to upload pics but this is jus some of the features
